import React,{useRef,useState}from'react';import{createChart}from'lightweight-charts';import{Card,CardContent,Typography,TextField,Button,Box,Stack}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StockChart=()=>{const chartContainerRef=useRef();const chartRef=useRef(null);const[symbol,setSymbol]=useState('');const fetchAndRenderChart=async ticker=>{try{const res=await fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/stock-data?symbol=${ticker}`);const json=await res.json();const data=json.data;if(!data){alert('Invalid symbol or no data found.');return;}const formattedData=data.t.map((time,i)=>({time:time,open:data.o[i],high:data.h[i],low:data.l[i],close:data.c[i]}));// Clear previous chart
if(chartRef.current){chartRef.current.remove();}const chart=createChart(chartContainerRef.current,{width:chartContainerRef.current.clientWidth,height:400});chart.addCandlestickSeries().setData(formattedData);chartRef.current=chart;}catch(err){console.error('Failed to load chart:',err);alert('Error fetching data.');}};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const ticker=symbol.trim().toUpperCase();if(ticker){fetchAndRenderChart(ticker);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{sx:{mt:4,boxShadow:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Real-Time Stock Chart Viewer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{component:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,sx:{mb:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:{xs:'column',sm:'row'},spacing:2,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Enter stock symbol (e.g. AAPL)",variant:"outlined",value:symbol,onChange:e=>setSymbol(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",sx:{minWidth:'120px'},children:"Load Chart"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{ref:chartContainerRef,sx:{width:'100%',height:400}})]})});};export default StockChart;
